description: Another forested loop in the West Bragg Creek area. This one makes a loop around Moose Pond. A few places with some views otherwise mostly through the trees. In winter IS all track set for Cross country skiing.
directions:
Take Hiway 22 (or hiway 8 from Calgary west) to Bragg Creek. Cross the only bridge and turn left at the T. Follow that all the way out (9km) to the
Provincial Recreation area (road turns into gravel at rec area gates). Follow the gravel to the parking lot at the end. Trail starts from west end of the parking lot. Follow the old road west.
title: Moose Loop Plus - West Bragg Creek
